type.description: The type or category of the metrics data.

id.description: The unique identifier for the metrics data.

updated.description: The timestamp when the metrics data was last updated.

name.description: The name of the metrics data.

created.description: The timestamp when the metrics data was created.

updated.description: The timestamp when the metrics data was last updated.

integration.description: Details about the integration used to fetch the metrics data.

links.description: Contains links related to the metric data

self.description: The URL to fetch more details about the metrics data.
